channel.title: Assessment Results Model on OSCAL
channel.description: Recent content in Assessment Results Model on OSCAL

item.title: Assessment Results Model JSON Format Outline
item.description: assessment-results [1]: {… }uuid [1]: uuid, metadata [1]: {… }, title [1]: markup-line, published [0 or 1]: dateTime-with-timezone, last-modified [1]: dateTime-with-timezone, version [1]: string, oscal-version [1]: string, revisions [0 or 1]: [ … ], An array of oscal-metadata-revision objects [1 to ∞]{ title [0 or 1]: markup-line, published [0 or 1]: dateTime-with-timezone, last-modified [0 or 1]: dateTime-with-timezone, version [0 or 1]: string, oscal-version [0 or 1]: string, props [0 or 1]: [ … ], An array of property objects [1 to ∞]{

item.title: Assessment Results Model JSON Format Reference
item.description: OSCAL model OSCAL Assessment Results Model Version 1.0.0-rc1 JSON Schema oscal_assessment-results_schema.json XML to JSON converter oscal_assessment-results_xml-to-json-converter.xsl (How do I use the converter to convert OSCAL XML to JSON?) The OSCAL assessment results format is used to describe the information typically provided by an assessor following an assessment. The root of the OSCAL assessment results format is assessment-results. Switch to XML action formal name Action Identifies an assessment-related event that must occur as part of executing an assessment plan, the result of which may be recorded within the assessment log in assessment results.

item.title: OSCAL Assessment Results Model XML Format Outline
item.description: <assessment-results uuid="uuid">… </assessment-results>[1]<metadata>… </metadata>[1]<title>markup-line</title>[1] <published>datetime-with-timezone</published>[0 or 1] <last-modified>datetime-with-timezone</last-modified>[1] <version>string</version>[1] <oscal-version>string</oscal-version>[1] <revisions>… </revisions>[0 or 1]<revision>… </revision>[0 to ∞]<title>markup-line</title>[0 or 1] <published>datetime-with-timezone</published>[0 or 1] <last-modified>datetime-with-timezone</last-modified>[0 or 1] <version>string</version>[0 or 1] <oscal-version>string</oscal-version>[0 or 1] <prop name="ncname" uuid="uuid" ns="uri" value="string" class="ncname">… </prop>[0 to ∞]<remarks>markup-multiline</remarks>[0 or 1] </prop> <link href="uri-reference" rel="ncname" media-type="string">… </link>[0 to ∞]<text>markup-line</text>[0 or 1] </link> <remarks>markup-multiline</remarks>[0 or 1] </revision> </revisions> <document-id scheme="uri">string</document-id>[0 to ∞] <prop name="ncname" uuid="uuid" ns="uri" value="string" class="ncname">… </prop>[0 to ∞]<remarks>markup-multiline</remarks>[0 or 1]

item.title: OSCAL Assessment Results Model XML Format Reference
item.description: OSCAL model OSCAL Assessment Results Model Version 1.0.0-rc1 XML namespace http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/oscal/1.0 XML Schema oscal_assessment-results_schema.xsd JSON to XML converter oscal_assessment-results_json-to-xml-converter.xsl (How do I use the converter to convert OSCAL JSON to XML?) The OSCAL assessment results format is used to describe the information typically provided by an assessor following an assessment. The root of the OSCAL assessment results format is assessment-results. Switch to JSON assessment-action formal name Action Identifies an assessment-related event that must occur as part of executing an assessment plan, the result of which may be recorded within the assessment log in assessment results.
